title: FAQ and Project Dependencies
description: A demonstration of FAQ and project dependencies using Next.js and Tailwind CSS

questions.question: What is this project about?
questions.answer: This project is a demonstration of a FAQ page and project dependencies display using Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS.

questions.question: How do I get started?
questions.answer: To get started, clone the repository and run `npm install` to install the dependencies. Then run `npm run dev` to start the development server.

questions.question: Is this project mobile-responsive?
questions.answer: Yes, this project is designed to be fully responsive and works well on both desktop and mobile devices.

questions.question: Can I contribute to this project?
questions.answer: We welcome contributions. Please check our GitHub repository for contribution guidelines.

questions.question: How do I report a bug?
questions.answer: If you find a bug, please open an issue on our GitHub repository with a detailed description of the problem and steps to reproduce it.
